entry.title: Sunday: Flurries. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of snow changing to periods of rain or drizzle this morning then to a few flurries near noon. Wind east 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 4 with temperature falling to plus 1 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls overnight. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm except 10 cm over higher terrain. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 this evening. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. Risk of snow squalls in the morning. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM NDT Sunday 2 April 2023
